content.en: Carbon price prediction: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to accurately predict carbon prices. They have developed various hybrid models that combine different algorithms to improve the accuracy of predictions. These models include algorithms such as extreme learning machines, ensemble forecasting models, and variational mode decomposition, among others. The goal is to find the most effective combination of algorithms to make reliable predictions about carbon prices.
content.da: Kulfirsprediktion: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til præcist at forudsige kulfirser. De har udviklet forskellige hybridmodeller, der kombinerer forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af forudsigelserne. Disse modeller inkluderer algoritmer som ekstrem læringsmaskiner, ensemble forudsigelsesmodeller og variational mode decomposition, blandt andre. Målet er at finde den mest effektive kombination af algoritmer til at lave pålidelige forudsigelser om kulfirser.
